name: Clutter 1000
description:
The greatest Clutter yet! Clutter 1000 is the most exciting Un-Hidden Object game you will ever play.

The object of the game? It's simple: click on two matching objects to remove them from the playfield. Pairs will merge and be swept away along the conveyor. Along with your old favorites there are twice as many new variations, for days of fun!

.

  • 1000 puzzles!
  • Colorful graphics
  • Hours of game play
  • Timed and Untimed modes
  • Clutter Infinity: Joe’s Ultimate Quest
